title: Wuhan
summary: Wuhan (/wuːˈhæn/, US also /wuːˈhɑːn, ˈwuː-/;[15] simplified Chinese: 武汉; traditional Chinese: 武漢; pinyin: Wǔhàn; [ù.xân] (listen)) is the capital of Hubei Province in the People's Republic of China.[16] It is the largest city in Hubei and the most populous city in Central China,[17] with a population of over eleven million, the ninth-most populous Chinese city and one of the nine National Central Cities of China.[18]
